content.description: This is achieved by watching all of the driving school videos.
content.name: Driving School Completion Award

content.description: Awarded for your first official race win in an dirt oval series.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.group_name: First Dirt Oval Series Race Win
content.name: First Win Dirt Oval Course

content.awarded_description: 2021-01-09, Rookie iRacing Rallycross Series
content.description: Awarded for your first official race win in a dirt road series.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.group_name: First Dirt Road Series Race Win
content.name: First Win Dirt Road Course

content.awarded_description: 2024-03-24, Formula A - Grand Prix Tour
content.description: Awarded for your first official race win in a Formula Car Road series.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.group_name: First Formula Car Road Series Race Win
content.name: First Win Formula Car Road Course

content.description: Awarded for your first official race win in an oval series.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: First Win Oval Course

content.awarded_description: 2020-05-13, Pure Driving School Formula Sprint
content.description: Awarded for your first official race win in a road series.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: First Win Road Course

content.description: Awarded for your first official race win in a Sports Car Road series.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.group_name: First Sports Car Road Series Race Win
content.name: First Win Sports Car Road Course

content.awarded_description: 2021 Season 2 iRacing Grand Prix Series Division 6 Race Championship, 1st Place
content.name: iRacing Grand Prix Division Racing Award

content.awarded_description: 2020 Season 3 iRacing Formula Renault 2.0 Division 9 Race Championship, 3rd Place
content.name: Formula Renalt 2 Racing Award Division Racing Award

content.awarded_description: 2020 Season 3 iRacing Formula 3.5 Championship Division 9 Race Championship, 3rd Place
content.name: iRacing Formula 3.5 Championship Division Racing Award
VRS Global Endurance Series Overall Racing Award

content.awarded_description: 2022 Season 1 Grand Prix Series Sprint - Fixed Division 6 Time Trial Championship, 3rd Place
content.name: Grand Prix Sprint Fixed Series Division Time Trial Award

content.description: Become a member of the 100% club by owning all the content iRacing has to offer.  This award is not revoked when new content is released.
content.name: 100% Club

content.awarded_description: Turned at least 100 official race and time trial laps.
content.description: Turn 100 official race or time trial laps.
content.name: 100 Laps

content.awarded_description: Turned at least 1,000 official race and time trial laps.
content.description: Turn 1,000 official race or time trial laps.
content.name: 1,000 Laps

content.awarded_description: Turned at least 10,000 official race and time trial laps.
content.description: Turn 10,000 official race or time trial laps.
content.name: 10,000 Laps

content.description: Turn 100,000 official race or time trial laps.
content.name: 100,000 Laps

content.awarded_description: Participated in at least 100 official races.
content.description: Participate in 100 official races.
content.name: 100 Races

content.awarded_description: Participated in at least 500 official races.
content.description: Participate in 500 official races.
content.name: 500 Races

content.description: Participate in 1,000 official races.
content.name: 1,000 Races

content.description: Participate in 10,000 official races.
content.name: 10,000 Races

content.description: Participate in 50,000 official races.
content.name: 50,000 Races

content.description: Participate in 100 official time trials.
content.name: 100 Time Trials

content.description: Participate in 500 official time trials.
content.name: 500 Time Trials

content.description: Participate in 1,000 official time trials.
content.name: 1,000 Time Trials

content.description: Participate in 10,000 official time trials.
content.name: 10,000 Time Trials

content.description: Participate in 50,000 official time trials.
content.name: 50,000 Time Trials

content.description: Complete the full season in all classes of an official multiclass series of at least 12 weeks.  Drop weeks are allowed.
content.name: Classy

content.description: Participate in a full Oval and Dirt Oval official series of at least 12 weeks in the same season. Drop weeks are allowed.
content.name: Super-Ovaler

content.description: Participate in a full Sports Car and Formula official series of at least 12 weeks in the same season. Drop weeks are allowed.
content.name: King of the Road

content.description: Participate in a full Dirt Oval and Dirt Road official series of at least 12 weeks in the same season. Drop weeks are allowed.
content.name: Mud Slinger

content.description: Participate in a full Oval, Sports Car, Formula, Dirt Oval and Dirt Road official series of at least 12 weeks in the same season. Drop weeks are allowed.
content.name: Master of Many

content.awarded_description: Award completed.
content.description: Participate in at least one official race or time trial 5 days out of the last 7 days.  Tracked by GMT.
content.name: Dedicated

content.description: Participate in at least one official race or time trial 20 days out of the last 28 days.  Tracked by GMT.
content.name: Addicted

content.description: Participate in at least one official race or time trial 60 days out of the last 84 days.  Tracked by GMT.
content.name: Time for an Intervention

content.description: Drive at every track in an open practice, hosted session, time trial, or race.
content.name: World Traveler

content.description: Win a dirt road race that counts toward your MPR while having the best iRating in the field.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Cruise Control - Dirt Road

content.description: Start in the bottom 10% of grid, finish in top 10% of grid with no incidents in an official dirt road race with grid size of at least 10.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Hard Charger Award - Dirt Road

content.description: Win an official dirt road race in which you have the lowest iRating.  There must be at least 10 drivers in your car class to qualify for this award.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Overachiever - Dirt Road

content.description: Start an official dirt oval race from the 1st spot on the grid for your car class.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Polesitter Award - Dirt Oval

content.awarded_description: Completed two consecutive dirt road finishes at own iRating or higher.
content.description: Complete 2 consecutive official dirt road races with no loss of iRating.  You must score championship points and complete 50% of the laps the class winner completes, rounded down, for the race to count toward this award.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.name: Consistent Finish Level 1 - Dirt Road

content.awarded_description: Completed two consecutive sports car finishes at own iRating or higher.
content.description: Complete 2 consecutive official Sports Car Road races with no loss of iRating.  You must score championship points and complete 50% of the laps the class winner completes, rounded down, for the race to count toward this award.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.group_name: Consistent Finish Level 1 - Sports Car Road
content.name: Consistent Finish Level 1 - Sports Car Road

content.awarded_description: Completed two consecutive formula car finishes at own iRating or higher.

You must score championship points and complete 50% of the laps the class winner completes, rounded down, for the race to count toward this award.  This award may not be earned while participating in a team event.
content.group_name: Consistent Finish Level 1 - Formula Car Road
content.name: Consistent Finish Level 1 - Formula Car Road

content.awarded_description: Won points for Australia/NZ during 2025 Season 1.
content.description: Win points for your club.
content.name: Club Contributor

content.awarded_description: Helped load test new telemetry system
content.description: Helped iRacing test the service in a planned QA testing event.  These events are run occasionally and are announced beforehand.  Watch the iRacing.com Staff Annoucements forum for future QA events!
content.name: iTested

content.description: Using the Subaru WRX STI beat Travis Pastrana’s hillclimb record of 5:28.67.  Can be earned in non-team hosted or time attack events.
content.name: Beat Travis

content.description: Using the Subaru WRX STI beat Travis Pastrana's hillclimb record of 5:28.67 while running the downhill course. Can be earned in non-team hosted or time attack events.
content.name: Easier Down Than Up

content.description: Using the Audi 90 GTO complete an uphill run.  Can be earned in non-team hosted or time attack events.
content.name: Quattro Extreme

content.description: Complete a downhill run in the Formula Vee.  Can be earned in non-team hosted or time attack events.
content.group_name: How Did That Get Up There
content.name: How Did That Get Up There

content.description: Using the Lucas Oil Off Road Pro 4 complete an uphill run.  Can be earned in non-team hosted or time attack events.
content.name: I Don't Need Roads

content.description: Complete an uphill run in the Lotus 49.  Can be earned in non-team hosted or time attack events.
content.name: You Did WHAT?!

content.description: Beat the original 1904 record of 24:37.60 in the Mercedes AMG GT3.  Can be earned in non-team hosted or time attack events.
content.name: New Meets Old

content.description: Complete an uphill run in either the NASCAR Chevrolet Monte Carlo - 1987 or NASCAR Ford Thunderbird - 1987 in under 10 minutes.  Can be earned in non-team hosted or time attack events.
content.name: A Long Way From Home

content.description: Complete an uphill run at night in any car.  Can be earned in non-team hosted only.
content.group_name: Are You Afraid of the Dark?
content.name: Are You Afraid of The Dark?
